None.Name: Crushed Ice
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, unit hurls an icy shard that deals 186 damage to enemies in a 10m radius around its target, up to 280 in total. Knocks back small and medium units.

None.Name: Earth Dive
None.Description: While moving around unit takes 50% less damage and knocks back small and medium units dealing additionally 175 damage to enemy units in target area, up to 700 in total. Affects ground targets only.

None.Name: Shatter Ice
None.Description: Deals 25% more damage against frozen creatures.
